description: i. Letter from Ian Austin, MP to Dr Phyllis Starkey MP concerning forthcoming publication of Planning Policy Statement for the Historic Environment and Planning Circular on the protection of World Heritage Sites. 1 p. ii. DCLG consultatoin paper on a new Planning Policy Statement 15: Planning for the Historic Environment. 73 p. iii. DCLG circular 07/2009 dated 24 July 2009 on the protection of world heritage sites. 8 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
